tool_description: Calculates confidence scores for property valuations based on comparable quality metrics including proximity, similarity, recency, and market conditions.

distances_miles.description: Distances from subject to each comparable property

size_differences_pct.description: Percentage size differences between subject and comparables

days_since_sale.description: Number of days since each comparable sale

total_adjustments_pct.description: Total adjustments as percentage of sale price for each comparable

market_volatility.description: Market volatility level: low, medium, or high

error_messages: Array length mismatch: All input arrays must have the same number of elements.
Invalid distance values: All distances must be positive numbers.
Invalid percentage values: Size differences and adjustment percentages must be non-negative numbers.
Invalid days since sale: All values must be non-negative integers.
Invalid market volatility: Use one of: low, medium, or high.
usage: Provide arrays of comparable quality metrics including distances, size differences, sale recency, and adjustment amounts. Optionally specify market volatility level. Returns overall confidence score and individual comparable ratings.

confidence_grade.description: Letter grade for confidence level: A, B, C, or D

individual_scores.description: Confidence score for each individual comparable
